title: Pocket Monsters + Nobunaga No Yabou - Ranse Iroemaki
alternative_title: ポケモン＋ノブナガの野望 ～ランセ彩絵巻～ ; Pocket Monsters + Nobunaga's Ambition -Ranse's Color Picture Scroll ; Pokémon Conquest - Ransei's Color Picture Scroll
status: ポケモン＋ノブナガの野望 ～ランセ彩絵巻～ ; Pocket Monsters + Nobunaga's Ambition -Ranse's Color Picture Scroll ; Pokémon Conquest - Ransei's Color Picture Scroll
description:
Description :
        Pokémon + Nobunaga's Ambition ~ Ranse's Color Picture Scroll ~ (Japanese: ポケモン＋ノブナガの野望 ～ランセ彩絵巻～) is a six chapter manga adaptation of Pokémon Conquest. It is illustrated by Nanatsumu Launch. Each chapter is hosted on Nico Nico Seiga. - Bulbapedia

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 4 : The Red Scroll: Kunoichi S Reasons
Chapter 3 : The Yellow Scroll: Hanbei & Kanbei
Chapter 2 : The Green Scroll: Kenshin S Adventure
